Title: La Strada
Writer: Federico Fellini (story and screenplay), Tullio Pinelli (story and screenplay), Tullio Pinelli (dialogue), Ennio Flaiano (screenplay collaborator)
Actors: Anthony Quinn, Giulietta Masina, Richard Basehart, Aldo Silvani
Plot: A care-free girl is sold to a traveling entertainer, consequently enduring physical and emotional pain along the way.
